name: Midnight Memories: First Chapter
description:
You wake up in the middle of an old abandoned park…
You have no idea how you got there...The only thing you remember is that you were celebrating your birthday with your friends last night.
Walking through the park you start to find objects that seem familiar to you to try to recover your memory.However, as you wander through the night, strange creatures(?) begin to follow you and try to capture you.So your only escape is to find all the objects as fast as possible without getting caught.

Main features:
  • Peaceful Ambient Atmosphere
  • New Chapters Will Be Added for Free in The Future
  • Discover the Main Character's Story
  • Chase Sequences
  • Collect Objects
  • First-person game


Find yourself in the process of solving the mystery of how you lost your memory and events the night before.

This free project was developed with the intention of learning and studying about the game development process, which means there are some imperfections. In the initial release only the first chapter of the story will be included but other chapters will be added. Hope you can enjoy this first project of my game developer career.
